import requests

url = "https://upload_image.p.rapidapi.comhttp://amit"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://upload_image.p.rapidapi.comhttp://amit"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upload_image.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
